data.message: How bad is this? We don't get a Christmas parade in Birmingham to turn on the lights and now the coke van isn't coming either.  Birmingham is England's second city.  Doesn't that mean anything.

replies.message: My thoughts exactly, kids love the parade and the truck, its the kids I feel sorry for!

Birmingham's annual Christmas Parade has been scrapped for 2015 because of city council budget cuts.

Earlier this year, Birmingham City Council slashed its budget by £105 million because it is getting less money from the government as part of austerity measures.
politicians lining their own pockets & It's us that miss out on things
